instruction: Analyze this resume against the job description. Provide a match score (0-100), identify missing skills, and suggest improvements.
input:
Resume:
Joe NotTheBidenEdition
Software Engineer
Skills: JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Git, HTML, CSS
Experience: 3 years building web applications, worked with REST APIs, responsive design, agile development
Education: BS Computer Science
Projects: E-commerce platform using MERN stack, Task management app with real-time updates

Job Description:
Senior Frontend Developer
Requirements: React, TypeScript, Next.js, GraphQL, Testing (Jest/Cypress), Redux, 4+ years experience
Responsibilities: Building scalable web applications, mentoring junior developers, code reviews
Bonus: Experience with microservices, CI/CD, AWS
output:
{
  "match_score": 65,
  "missing_skills": ["TypeScript", "Next.js", "GraphQL", "Jest", "Cypress", "Redux", "Testing frameworks"],
  "experience_gap": "1 year short of senior level requirement",
  "strengths": ["React", "JavaScript", "Web development experience", "Full-stack capabilities", "Project portfolio"],
  "suggestions": [
    "Add TypeScript to your skillset - it's essential for this role",
    "Learn Next.js framework for React applications",
    "Gain experience with GraphQL for API development",
    "Add testing experience with Jest and Cypress",
    "Learn Redux for state management",
    "Consider projects that demonstrate senior-level architecture decisions"
  ],
  "recommended_actions": [
    "Build a portfolio project using TypeScript and Next.js",
    "Complete online courses in GraphQL and testing",
    "Contribute to open source projects to show advanced skills",
    "Add unit and integration tests to existing projects"
  ]
}

instruction: Analyze this resume against the job description. Provide a match score (0-100), identify missing skills, and suggest improvements.
input:
Resume:
Jimmy Johnson
Full Stack Developer
Skills: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, React, HTML/CSS, Git, Linux
Experience: 5 years, built e-commerce platforms, API development, cloud deployment, database optimization
Education: MS Computer Science
Certifications: AWS Solutions Architect Associate

Job Description:
Backend Engineer
Requirements: Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CI/CD
Experience with microservices architecture and high-traffic applications
3+ years backend development experience required
output:
{
  "match_score": 80,
  "missing_skills": ["FastAPI", "Redis", "Kubernetes", "CI/CD pipelines", "Microservices architecture"],
  "experience_gap": "None - exceeds experience requirements",
  "strengths": ["Python", "PostgreSQL", "Docker", "AWS", "Backend development", "Cloud experience", "Database skills"],
  "suggestions": [
    "Learn FastAPI - it's the specific framework they're using",
    "Gain experience with Redis for caching and session management",
    "Learn Kubernetes for container orchestration",
    "Set up CI/CD pipelines in your projects",
    "Study microservices architecture patterns"
  ],
  "recommended_actions": [
    "Migrate a Django project to FastAPI to learn the framework",
    "Add Redis caching to an existing project",
    "Complete a Kubernetes tutorial and deploy a sample app",
    "Set up GitHub Actions or Jenkins for automated deployment",
    "Refactor a monolithic project into microservices"
  ]
}

instruction: Analyze this resume against the job description. Provide a match score (0-100), identify missing skills, and suggest improvements.
input:
Resume:
Mike TheBike
Data Scientist
Skills: Python, R, SQL, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Jupyter, Git
Experience: 2 years, predictive modeling, data visualization, statistical analysis
Education: PhD Statistics
Projects: Customer churn prediction, sales forecasting model, NLP sentiment analysis

Job Description:
Machine Learning Engineer
Requirements: Python, PyTorch, MLOps, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS/GCP, MLflow, 3+ years ML experience
Responsibilities: Model deployment, monitoring, pipeline automation, production ML systems
Preferred: Experience with large-scale ML systems, A/B testing, model versioning
output:
{
  "match_score": 45,
  "missing_skills": ["PyTorch", "MLOps", "Docker", "Kubernetes", "AWS/GCP", "MLflow", "Model deployment", "Pipeline automation"],
  "experience_gap": "1 year short, lacks production ML experience",
  "strengths": ["Python", "Machine learning fundamentals", "Statistical background", "Research experience", "Model development"],
  "suggestions": [
    "Learn PyTorch for deep learning (you have TensorFlow which helps)",
    "Gain MLOps experience - focus on model deployment and monitoring",
    "Learn Docker and Kubernetes for containerization",
    "Get cloud experience with AWS or GCP ML services",
    "Learn MLflow for experiment tracking and model versioning",
    "Focus on production ML systems rather than just research"
  ],
  "recommended_actions": [
    "Deploy one of your existing models to production using Docker",
    "Complete AWS ML certification or Google Cloud ML courses",
    "Build an end-to-end ML pipeline with monitoring",
    "Learn about A/B testing for ML models",
    "Contribute to MLOps open source projects"
  ]
}

instruction: Analyze this resume against the job description. Provide a match score (0-100), identify missing skills, and suggest improvements.
input:
Resume:
Jerry Bob
Mobile Developer

Experience: 4 years, built 8+ mobile apps, app store deployment, cross-platform development
Education: BS Software Engineering
Achievements: Apps with 100K+ downloads, 4.8 star average rating

Job Description:
Senior Mobile Developer
Requirements: React Native, TypeScript, Redux, Native iOS/Android, Testing, CI/CD, 5+ years experience
Responsibilities: Lead mobile development, architecture decisions, mentoring, code reviews
Bonus: Experience with GraphQL, push notifications, offline functionality
output:
{
  "match_score": 85,
  "missing_skills": ["Native iOS development", "Native Android development", "Mobile testing frameworks", "CI/CD for mobile"],
  "experience_gap": "1 year short of senior requirement",
  "strengths": ["React Native", "TypeScript", "Redux", "Cross-platform development", "Proven track record", "User engagement"],
  "suggestions": [
    "Learn native iOS development (Swift) for platform-specific features",
    "Learn native Android development (Kotlin) for better performance",
    "Add mobile testing with Jest, Detox, or Appium",
    "Set up CI/CD pipelines for mobile app deployment",
    "Focus on leadership and mentoring experiences"
  ],
  "recommended_actions": [
    "Build a native iOS module for an existing React Native app",
    "Add comprehensive testing to your mobile apps",
    "Set up automated deployment to app stores",
    "Document your architecture decisions in a technical blog",
    "Mentor junior developers or contribute to open source"
  ]
}

instruction: Analyze this resume against the job description. Provide a match score (0-100), identify missing skills, and suggest improvements.
input:
Resume:
Nolan Bradley
DevOps Engineer
Skills: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Python, Bash, Linux, Git
Experience: 6 years, infrastructure automation, CI/CD pipelines, cloud migration, monitoring
Education: BS Computer Engineering
Certifications: AWS Solutions Architect Pro, CKA (Certified Kubernetes Administrator)

Job Description:
Senior DevOps Engineer
Requirements: AWS/Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD, Monitoring, 5+ years experience
Responsibilities: Infrastructure as Code, automated deployments, system reliability, team mentoring
Preferred: Experience with microservices, service mesh, observability tools
output:
{
  "match_score": 95,
  "missing_skills": ["Azure", "Service mesh (Istio/Linkerd)", "Advanced observability tools"],
  "experience_gap": "None - exceeds requirements",
  "strengths": ["AWS expertise", "Kubernetes", "Terraform", "CI/CD", "Infrastructure automation", "Strong certifications", "Leadership experience"],
  "suggestions": [
    "Add Azure experience for multi-cloud competency",
    "Learn service mesh technologies like Istio or Linkerd",
    "Expand observability skills with tools like Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger",
    "Consider advanced certifications in Azure or Kubernetes"
  ],
  "recommended_actions": [
    "Deploy a sample application to Azure to gain multi-cloud experience",
    "Implement a service mesh in a test environment",
    "Set up comprehensive monitoring and alerting for microservices",
    "Write technical articles about DevOps best practices",
    "Speak at conferences or meetups about your experience"
  ]
}
